attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think Britain should bring back hanging for all murderers and Sex Offenders. Our Jails are over crowded and us, the public are paying for them to live a cushty and secure life. Maybe if death was on the cards they would think twice about committing such horrible crimes

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
